org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel

Interface Row

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Cell>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HSSFRow, SXSSFRow, XSSFRow 

    public interface Row
extends java.lang.Iterable<Cell>
    High level representation of a row of a spreadsheet.(电子表格行的高级表示。)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Row.MissingCellPolicy
      Used to specify the different possible policies if for the case of null and blank cells(用于指定空单元格和空白单元格情况下的不同可能策略)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Iterator<Cell> cellIterator() 
      Cell createCell(int column)
      Use this to create new cells within the row and return it.(使用此功能在行内创建新单元格并返回它。)
      Cell createCell(int column, CellType type)
      Use this to create new cells within the row and return it.(使用此功能在行内创建新单元格并返回它。)
      Cell getCell(int cellnum)
      Get the cell representing a given column (logical cell) 0-based.(从0开始获取代表给定列（逻辑单元格）的单元格。)
      Cell getCell(int cellnum, Row.MissingCellPolicy policy)
      Returns the cell at the given (0 based) index, with the specified Row.MissingCellPolicy(返回给定（从0开始）索引处的单元格，具有指定的Row。MissingCellPolicy)
      short getFirstCellNum()
      Get the number of the first cell contained in this row.(获取此行包含的第一个单元格的编号。)
      short getHeight()
      Get the row's height measured in twips (1/20th of a point).(测量行的高度，单位为小数点（1/20点）。)
      float getHeightInPoints()
      Returns row height measured in point size.(返回以点大小测量的行高。)

      Gets the index of the last cell contained in this row PLUS ONE.(获取此行包含的最后一个单元格的索引PLUS ONE。)
      int getOutlineLevel()
      Returns the rows outline level.(返回行大纲级别。)
      int getPhysicalNumberOfCells()
      Gets the number of defined cells (NOT number of cells in the actual row!).(获取已定义的单元格数（不是实际行中的单元格数！）。)
      int getRowNum()
      Get row number this row represents(获取此行代表的行号)
      CellStyle getRowStyle()
      Returns the whole-row cell styles.(返回整行单元格样式。)
      Sheet getSheet()
      Returns the Sheet this row belongs to(返回此行所属的工作表)

      Get whether or not to display this row with 0 height(获取是否以0高度显示此行)
      boolean isFormatted()
      Is this row formatted? Most aren't, but some rows do have whole-row styles.(此行是否已格式化？大多数都不是，但有些行确实有整行样式。)

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Iterable

        forEach, iterator, spliterator

    • Method Detail

      • createCell

        Cell createCell(int column)
        Use this to create new cells within the row and return it.

        The cell that is returned is a CellType.BLANK. The type can be changed either through calling setCellValue or setCellType.

        (使用此功能在行内创建新单元格并返回它。返回的单元格是CellTyp.BLANK。可以通过调用setCellValue或setCellType来更改类型。)
        Parameters:
        column - - the column number this cell represents(列- -此单元格代表的列号)
        Returns:
        Cell a high level representation of the created cell.(单元格是所创建单元格的高级表示。)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if columnIndex < 0 or greater than the maximum number of supported columns (255 for *.xls, 1048576 for *.xlsx)(java.lang. IllegalArgument例外-如果专栏索引< 0或大于支持的最大列数（*.xls为255，*.xlsx为1048576）)

      • createCell

        Cell createCell(int column,
                CellType type)
        Use this to create new cells within the row and return it.

        The cell that is returned will be of the requested type. The type can be changed either through calling setCellValue or setCellType, but there is a small overhead to doing this, so it is best to create of the required type up front.

        (使用此功能在行内创建新单元格并返回它。返回的单元格将属于请求的类型。可以通过调用setCellValue或setCellType来更改类型，但这样做的费用很小，因此最好提前创建所需的类型。)
        Parameters:
        column - - the column number this cell represents(列- -此单元格代表的列号)
        type - - the cell's data type(类型- -单元格的数据类型)
        Returns:
        Cell a high level representation of the created cell.(单元格是所创建单元格的高级表示。)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if columnIndex < 0 or greater than a maximum number of supported columns (255 for *.xls, 1048576 for *.xlsx)(java.lang. IllegalArgument例外-如果专栏索引< 0或大于支持的最大列数（*.xls为255，*.xlsx为1048576）)

      • removeCell

        void removeCell(Cell cell)
        Remove the Cell from this row.(从此行中删除单元格。)
        Parameters:
        cell - the cell to remove(cell -要删除的细胞)

      • setRowNum

        void setRowNum(int rowNum)
        Set the row number of this row.(设置此行的行号。)
        Parameters:
        rowNum - the row number (0-based)(RowSYS-行号（从0开始）)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if rowNum < 0(java.lang.IllegalArgumentException -如果行数< 0)

      • getRowNum

        int getRowNum()
        Get row number this row represents(获取此行代表的行号)
        Returns:
        the row number (0 based)(行号（从0开始）)

      • getCell

        Cell getCell(int cellnum)
        Get the cell representing a given column (logical cell) 0-based. If you ask for a cell that is not defined....you get a null.(从0开始获取代表给定列（逻辑单元格）的单元格。如果您请求未定义的单元格....你得到一个null。)
        Parameters:
        cellnum - 0 based column number(基于cellnum - 0的列号)
        Returns:
        Cell representing that column or null if undefined.(代表该列的单元格，如果未定义，则为空。)
        See Also:
        getCell(int, org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Row.MissingCellPolicy)

      • getCell

        Cell getCell(int cellnum,
             Row.MissingCellPolicy policy)
        Returns the cell at the given (0 based) index, with the specified Row.MissingCellPolicy(返回给定（从0开始）索引处的单元格，具有指定的Row。MissingCellPolicy)
        Returns:
        the cell at the given (0 based) index(给定索引（从0开始）处的像元)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if cellnum < 0 or the specified MissingCellPolicy is invalid(java.lang. IllegalArgument异常-如果cellnum < 0或指定的MissingCellPolicy无效)

      • getFirstCellNum

        short getFirstCellNum()
        Get the number of the first cell contained in this row. Note: cells which had content before and were set to empty later might still be counted as cells by Excel and Apache POI, so the result of this method will include such rows and thus the returned value might be lower than expected!(获取此行包含的第一个单元格的编号。注：之前有内容但后来设置为空的单元格可能仍然被Excel和Apache DOE算作单元格，因此该方法的结果将包括此类行，因此返回的值可能低于预期！)
        Returns:
        short representing the first logical cell in the row, or -1 if the row does not contain any cells.(短表示行中的第一个逻辑单元格，如果行不包含任何单元格，则为-1。)

      • getLastCellNum

        short getLastCellNum()
        Gets the index of the last cell contained in this row PLUS ONE. The result also happens to be the 1-based column number of the last cell. This value can be used as a standard upper bound when iterating over cells: 
         short minColIx = row.getFirstCellNum();
 short maxColIx = row.getLastCellNum();
 for(short colIx=minColIx; colIx<maxColIx; colIx++) {
   Cell cell = row.getCell(colIx);
   if(cell == null) {
     continue;
   }
   //... do something with cell
 }
        Note: cells which had content before and were set to empty later might still be counted as cells by Excel and Apache POI, so the result of this method will include such rows and thus the returned value might be higher than expected!        (获取此行包含的最后一个单元格的索引PLUS ONE。结果也恰好是最后一个单元格的从1开始的列号。迭代单元格时，该值可以用作标准上限：Short minCollix = row. getFirstCellHandler（）; Short MaxCollix = row. getLastCellHandler（）; for（short colIx=minColIx; colIx)
        Returns:
        short representing the last logical cell in the row PLUS ONE, or -1 if the row does not contain any cells.(缩写表示行中的最后一个逻辑单元格加一，或者如果行不包含任何单元格，则为-1。)

      • getPhysicalNumberOfCells

        int getPhysicalNumberOfCells()
        Gets the number of defined cells (NOT number of cells in the actual row!). That is to say if only columns 0,4,5 have values then there would be 3.(获取已定义的单元格数（不是实际行中的单元格数！）。也就是说，如果只有第0、4、5列有值，那么就会有3列。)
        Returns:
        int representing the number of defined cells in the row.(int表示行中已定义单元格的数量。)

      • setHeight

        void setHeight(short height)
        Set the row's height or set to ff (-1) for undefined/default-height. Set the height in "twips" or 1/20th of a point.(设置行的高度或将未定义/默认高度设置为ff（-1）。将高度设置为“twips”或1/20点。)
        Parameters:
        height - rowheight or 0xff for undefined (use sheet default)(height -rowthight或0xff（未定义）（使用表格默认值）)

      • setZeroHeight

        void setZeroHeight(boolean zHeight)
        Set whether or not to display this row with 0 height(设置是否以0高度显示此行)
        Parameters:
        zHeight - height is zero or not.(zHeight -高度是否为零。)

      • getZeroHeight

        boolean getZeroHeight()
        Get whether or not to display this row with 0 height(获取是否以0高度显示此行)
        Returns:
        - zHeight height is zero or not.(- zHeight高度是否为零。)

      • setHeightInPoints

        void setHeightInPoints(float height)
        Set the row's height in points.(以点为单位设置行的高度。)
        Parameters:
        height - the height in points. -1 resets to the default height(高度-以分为单位的高度。-1重置为默认高度)

      • getHeight

        short getHeight()
        Get the row's height measured in twips (1/20th of a point). If the height is not set, the default worksheet value is returned, See Sheet.getDefaultRowHeightInPoints()(测量行的高度，单位为小数点（1/20点）。如果未设置高度，则返回默认工作表值，请参阅Sheet. getProtect RowHeightInPoints（）)
        Returns:
        row height measured in twips (1/20th of a point)(行高测量单位为两点（1/20点）)

      • getHeightInPoints

        float getHeightInPoints()
        Returns row height measured in point size. If the height is not set, the default worksheet value is returned, See Sheet.getDefaultRowHeightInPoints()(返回以点大小测量的行高。如果未设置高度，则返回默认工作表值，请参阅Sheet. getProtect RowHeightInPoints（）)
        Returns:
        row height measured in point size(以点大小测量的行高)
        See Also:
        Sheet.getDefaultRowHeightInPoints()

      • isFormatted

        boolean isFormatted()
        Is this row formatted? Most aren't, but some rows do have whole-row styles. For those that do, you can get the formatting from getRowStyle()(此行是否已格式化？大多数都不是，但有些行确实有整行样式。对于那些这样做的人，您可以从getRowStyle（）获取格式)

      • getRowStyle

        CellStyle getRowStyle()
        Returns the whole-row cell styles. Most rows won't have one of these, so will return null. Call isFormatted() to check first.(返回整行单元格样式。大多数行都没有其中之一，因此将返回空。先调用issported（）检查。)

      • setRowStyle

        void setRowStyle(CellStyle style)
        Applies a whole-row cell styling to the row.(将整行单元格样式复制到该行。)

      • cellIterator

        java.util.Iterator<Cell> cellIterator()
        Returns:
        Cell iterator of the physically defined cells. Note element 4 may actually be row cell depending on how many are defined!(物理定义单元的单元迭代器。注意，元素4实际上可能是行单元格，具体取决于定义了多少！)

      • getSheet

        Sheet getSheet()
        Returns the Sheet this row belongs to(返回此行所属的工作表)
        Returns:
        the Sheet that owns this row(拥有此行的表)

      • getOutlineLevel

        int getOutlineLevel()
        Returns the rows outline level. Increased as you put it into more groups (outlines), reduced as you take it out of them.(返回行大纲级别。当你将其放入更多组（大纲）时，它就会增加，当你将其从组中取出时，它就会减少。)

      • shiftCellsRight

        void shiftCellsRight(int firstShiftColumnIndex,
                     int lastShiftColumnIndex,
                     int step)

      • shiftCellsLeft

        void shiftCellsLeft(int firstShiftColumnIndex,
                    int lastShiftColumnIndex,
                    int step)
